biography: Mikko is a familiar face around Kurk Golf, known for his meticulous approach to the game and his calm demeanor on the course. While he may appear reserved, those who know him well can attest to his sharp wit and unwavering determination.
He has appeared once at the Hector Trophée, and his experience will undoubtedly serve him well as he continues to refine his skills and compete at the highest level.
Although Mikko will not be participating in Hector Trophée 2025, the possibility of last-minute changes always leaves room for hope among his supporters.
